comment: Dr. Blair is very nice. Their are lots of submitted assignments and weekly discussions but her grading is more than fair. Follow the instructions and you will do fine. She does a good job of trying to respond to questions in a timely manner and is more than willing to help you if you ask her for it. Drops low grades if you have good attendance.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Her lectures are boring but overall if you put in the effort she will for sure help you. There are 3 essays and you get to choose the topics for each, please take advantage and get her help. Theres a lot of busy work but its easy if you simply ask a lot of questions and show her you care about your work and grades. Attendance counts as a grade.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Dr.Blair, as a whole, kinda rude. 3 essays total and lots of in class assignments. The in-class assignments are extremely hard to find, she super unorganized. There are no grading rubrics, just instructions. I would not take her again. also lectures are extremely boring. most of the time she sits in her chair and classes are silent.

She's a really nice lady. Her class is pretty easy, you get like 3 major essays and you get to choose your own topic (movie, ad, album, song) for them that obviously relates to the prompt. There are very few discussion posts to do as well, but overall it's a pretty chill class.
Show up to class for extra credit. I don't like English but she makes this class more enjoyable. Do good on the papers to get a good grade. Managble workload.

Professor Blair is a very reasonable professor. She structures her class by giving small assignments that prepare you for the upcoming larger ones which is very helpful. She also gives rubrics for all of the bigger assignments.

There are four main projects that if you do well on you honestly probably don't need to try that hard on the rest of the class. She's a bit of a tough grader on the essays but just follow the rubric and you'll be fine. Pick a good topic though because you'll struggle if you don't

Overall, she's a tough grader but I had only one big paper at the end of her class and I felt she definitely helped us prepare for it. This class isn't that bad but it felt boring when you met in person, just make sure you get work done outside of class and ask questions.

She's an okay professor. If you take her be prepared for some boring lectures. Most of the time we just sat in silence. Her papers are easy but she grades super weird and will knock off points for really minor things. She doesn't post rubrics either, just directions. She takes forever to grade so don't except anything for a few weeks.

Dr. Blair is a good professor. She will guide/advise you without being intrusive. Her classes are relaxed, but she makes you become more analytic,she makes you think hard. I will take another class with her without hesitation.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Get ready to read

comment: Professor Blair was a decent professor! She cares about her students and does anything to help students understand her instructions. She also is accessible outside of class and she responds to emails in a decent time frame. If you email her, youll hear back from her in less than 24 hours. But, the only thing is that her instructions arent clear.

The class was very easy. Grades are only based on 4 essays. Lectures were relatively boring & the material that was covered, most people already know. Essays had clear instructions and she gives students opportunities to ask questions in class.

I'm gonna say how it is. She is probably the flakiest professor II have ever had. She never responds to emails and when she does it's a week and a half later. So if you're looking to get feedback from her on that, try again. Not to mention her grading system, which is fine it's just none existent. She still hasn't graded my essay from 3 mo. ago.

Dr. Blair is meh. You'll only have 4 essays to write, so make sure they are perfect. Idk what the other review was saying about her being willing to work with you, but you better make sure you have questions ready for her during class, otherwise you'll be waiting for emails all day. Instructions are sometimes unclear on writing assignments.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: Shes a pretty good professor! She really does care about you and your grade. If you have any issues shes very understanding and is willing to work with you. I totally recommend.
Dr. Blair is a very good professor. I would be delighted to take another class with her.
